alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 03 at 1:48AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Residual flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of central Maryland, including the following county: Montgomery. * WHEN...Until 445 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 148 AM EDT, local law enforcement reported flooding is ongoing. Between 4 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rockville... Gaithersburg... Aspen Hill... Potomac... North Bethesda... North Potomac... Redland... Rossmoor... Wheaton-Glenmont... Wheaton... Darnestown... Derwood... Washington Grove... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
